page.title: 11SHOPPING:HINTON CHARTERHOUSE
page.content: THERE IS ONLY ONE SHOP IN HINTON CHARTERHOUSE-A{GENERAL STORES.}FOUR PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED HERE, ON DIFFERENT SHIFTS, BUT WITH ONLY ONE PERSON SERVING AT ANY ONE TIME. THE SHOP IS VERY MUCH THE CENTRE OF VILLAGE LIFE DURING THE DAY, AS MOST OF THE CUSTOMERS ARE LOCAL PEOPLE, WHO CALL IN FOR A CHAT AS WELL AS TO BUY THE GOODS THEY NEED. ALTHOUGH THE PRICES ARE SLIGHTLY HIGHER THAN IN THE TOWN, THE ELDERLY INHABITANTS PREFER NOT TO HAVE THE TROUBLE OF A BUS JOURNEY TO OBTAIN THEIR WEEKLY SHOPPING. AFTER ALL, THE SHOP CATERS FOR MOST OF THEIR NEEDS, AS IT SELLS GROCERIES, FRESH FRUIT AND VEGETABLES, NEWSPAPERS AND MEDICAL GOODS. SHOPLIFTING IS NOT A MAJOR PROBLEM FOR THE STORES, ALTHOUGH SEVERAL PEOPLE HAVE BEEN SUSPECTED, AND ONE HAS BEEN CAUGHT.
